# TECHNICAL SPECIFICATION: WS-008 - Navigation Structure
## Generated by Feature Development Session - 2025-08-21

### USER STORY & BUSINESS CONTEXT (THINK HARD - BE FACTUAL)
**As a:** Wedding florist using WedSync throughout my busy workday
**I want to:** Navigate between platform sections intuitively with consistent patterns and quick access
**So that:** I can move from client list to forms to communications in under 3 clicks instead of getting lost in complex menus for 30+ seconds per navigation

**Real Wedding Scenario:**
A florist working on 3 simultaneous tasks: 1) Check today's client responses (Communications), 2) Update timeline for Saturday wedding (Journeys), 3) Send revised proposal to new inquiry (Forms). Currently using a competitor with confusing navigation takes 45+ seconds per section switch due to unclear icons and nested menus. With intuitive navigation structure, they use clear top-level sections (Dashboard, Clients, Forms, Journeys, Communications), consistent sidebar context, and keyboard shortcuts - reducing navigation time to 5 seconds per switch, saving 2+ minutes per task cycle across 20+ daily switches.

### SPECIFICATION SOURCE
- **Feature ID:** WS-008
- **Original Spec:** /CORE-SPECIFICATIONS/02-WEDSYNC-SUPPLIER-PLATFORM/02-Dashboard/02-navigation-structure md.md
- **Current Implementation:** 0% complete
- **Files to Modify:**
  - /src/app/(dashboard)/layout.tsx (add navigation)
- **New Files to Create:**
  - /src/components/navigation/TopNavigation.tsx
  - /src/components/navigation/SideNavigation.tsx

  - /src/lib/navigation/navigationConfig.ts

### TECHNICAL DESIGN

#### Database Schema Required
```sql
-- User navigation preferences
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS navigation_preferences (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
  user_id UUID REFERENCES auth.users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  sidebar_collapsed BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  favorite_sections TEXT[] DEFAULT ARRAY[]::TEXT[],
  recent_sections TEXT[] DEFAULT ARRAY[]::TEXT[],
  custom_shortcuts JSONB DEFAULT '{}',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
  
  UNIQUE(user_id)
);

-- Navigation analytics
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS navigation_analytics (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
  user_id UUID REFERENCES auth.users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  section_from TEXT,
  section_to TEXT NOT NULL,
  navigation_method TEXT CHECK (navigation_method IN ('click', 'keyboard', 'search', 'breadcrumb')) DEFAULT 'click',
  session_id TEXT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- Feature access control by tier
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS feature_access (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
  feature_key TEXT NOT NULL,
  tier_required TEXT CHECK (tier_required IN ('starter', 'professional', 'enterprise')) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
  
  UNIQUE(feature_key)
);

-- Indexes
CREATE INDEX idx_nav_preferences_user_id ON navigation_preferences(user_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_nav_analytics_user_session ON navigation_analytics(user_id, session_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_nav_analytics_timestamp ON navigation_analytics(timestamp);
```

#### API Endpoints Required
```typescript
// GET /api/navigation/config
interface NavigationConfigResponse {
  success: boolean;
  data: {
    sections: Array<{
      id: string;
      label: string;
      icon: string;
      href: string;
      badge?: {
        count: number;
        variant: 'default' | 'urgent' | 'success';
      };
      subsections: Array<{
        id: string;
        label: string;
        href: string;
        description?: string;
      }>;
      accessLevel: 'starter' | 'professional' | 'enterprise' | 'all';
      comingSoon?: boolean;
    }>;
    shortcuts: Array<{
      key: string;
      label: string;
      action: string;
      href?: string;
    }>;
    userPreferences: {
      sidebarCollapsed: boolean;
      favoriteSections: string[];
      recentSections: string[];
    };
  };
}

// PATCH /api/navigation/preferences
interface UpdateNavigationPreferencesRequest {
  sidebarCollapsed?: boolean;
  favoriteSections?: string[];
  customShortcuts?: Record<string, string>;
}

// POST /api/navigation/track
interface TrackNavigationRequest {
  from?: string;
  to: string;
  method: 'click' | 'keyboard' | 'search' | 'breadcrumb';
  sessionId: string;
}

// GET /api/navigation/search
interface NavigationSearchRequest {
  query: string;
  limit?: number;
}

interface NavigationSearchResponse {
  success: boolean;
  data: {
    results: Array<{
      type: 'page' | 'client' | 'form' | 'journey' | 'action';
      title: string;
      description: string;
      href: string;
      icon: string;
      section: string;
      keywords: string[];
    }>;
  };
}
```

#### Frontend Components Required
```typescript
// Component: TopNavigation
// Location: /src/components/navigation/TopNavigation.tsx

interface TopNavigationProps {
  currentSection: string;
  user: User;
  onSectionChange: (section: string) => void;
  onSearch: (query: string) => void;
}

// Key functionality:
- Persistent top bar with logo and main sections
- Active section highlighting
- Universal search with Cmd+K shortcut
- User menu with profile and settings
- Notification bell with badge count
- Mobile: Hamburger menu toggle
- Responsive: Hide labels on smaller screens

// Component: SideNavigation
// Location: /src/components/navigation/SideNavigation.tsx

interface SideNavigationProps {
  section: string;
  collapsed: boolean;
  onToggleCollapse: () => void;
  subsections: NavigationItem[];
}

// Key functionality:
- Contextual sidebar based on current section
- Collapsible with state persistence
- Subsection navigation with descriptions
- Feature lock indicators for tier restrictions
- Recent items and favorites
- Keyboard navigation support
- Tooltip labels when collapsed

// Component: MobileNavigation
// Location: /src/components/navigation/MobileNavigation.tsx

interface MobileNavigationProps {
  currentSection: string;
  sections: NavigationSection[];
  onSectionChange: (section: string) => void;
}

// Key functionality:
- Bottom tab bar with 5 main sections
- Gesture support for swipe navigation
- Badge indicators for notifications
- "More" menu for additional features
- Active state with proper contrast
- Safe area handling for iOS

// Component: CommandPalette
// Location: /src/components/navigation/CommandPalette.tsx

interface CommandPaletteProps {
  open: boolean;
  onClose: () => void;
  onNavigate: (href: string) => void;
}

// Key functionality:
- Fuzzy search across all content
- Recent searches with quick access
- Keyboard navigation (up/down, enter)
- Action shortcuts (new client, create form)
- Categories: Pages, Clients, Forms, Actions
- Search result highlighting
```

#### Integration Points
```typescript
// Configuration: navigationConfig
// Dependencies: user permissions, feature flags

export const navigationConfig: NavigationConfig = {
  sections: [
    {
      id: 'dashboard',
      label: 'Dashboard',
      icon: 'Home',
      href: '/dashboard',
      subsections: []
    },
    {
      id: 'clients',
      label: 'Clients',
      icon: 'Users',
      href: '/clients',
      subsections: [
        { id: 'all-clients', label: 'All Clients', href: '/clients' },
        { id: 'active-clients', label: 'Active', href: '/clients?status=active' },
        { id: 'upcoming-weddings', label: 'Upcoming', href: '/clients?status=upcoming' },
        { id: 'past-weddings', label: 'Past', href: '/clients?status=past' },
        { id: 'import-clients', label: 'Import', href: '/clients/import' }
      ]
    },
    {
      id: 'forms',
      label: 'Forms',
      icon: 'FileText',
      href: '/forms',
      subsections: [
        { id: 'my-forms', label: 'My Forms', href: '/forms' },
        { id: 'create-form', label: 'Create', href: '/forms/create' },
        { id: 'responses', label: 'Responses', href: '/forms/responses' },
        { id: 'templates', label: 'Templates', href: '/forms/templates' }
      ]
    },
    {
      id: 'journeys',
      label: 'Journeys',
      icon: 'GitBranch',
      href: '/journeys',
      accessLevel: 'professional',
      subsections: [
        { id: 'journey-canvas', label: 'Canvas', href: '/journeys/canvas' },
        { id: 'active-journeys', label: 'Active', href: '/journeys/active' },
        { id: 'draft-journeys', label: 'Drafts', href: '/journeys/drafts' },
        { id: 'journey-analytics', label: 'Analytics', href: '/journeys/analytics' }
      ]
    },
    {
      id: 'communications',
      label: 'Communications',
      icon: 'MessageSquare',
      href: '/communications',
      subsections: [
        { id: 'email-templates', label: 'Email Templates', href: '/communications/email' },
        { id: 'sms-templates', label: 'SMS Templates', href: '/communications/sms' },
        { id: 'message-history', label: 'History', href: '/communications/history' },
        { id: 'bulk-messaging', label: 'Bulk Send', href: '/communications/bulk' }
      ]
    },
    {
      id: 'growth',
      label: 'Growth',
      icon: 'TrendingUp',
      href: '/growth',
      accessLevel: 'professional',
      subsections: [
        { id: 'referral-program', label: 'Referrals', href: '/growth/referrals' },
        { id: 'review-collection', label: 'Reviews', href: '/growth/reviews' },
        { id: 'directory-listing', label: 'Directory', href: '/growth/directory' },
        { id: 'analytics', label: 'Analytics', href: '/growth/analytics' }
      ]
    }
  ],
  shortcuts: [
    { key: 'cmd+k', label: 'Search', action: 'open-command-palette' },
    { key: 'cmd+n', label: 'New', action: 'contextual-new' },
    { key: 'cmd+m', label: 'Message', action: 'new-message' },
    { key: 'cmd+i', label: 'Import', action: 'import-clients' },
    { key: '1-6', label: 'Navigate', action: 'switch-section' }
  ]
};

// Store: navigationStore
interface NavigationStore {
  currentSection: string;
  currentPath: string;
  sidebarCollapsed: boolean;
  recentSections: string[];
  breadcrumbs: BreadcrumbItem[];
  
  setCurrentSection: (section: string) => void;
  toggleSidebar: () => void;
  addToRecent: (section: string) => void;
  setBreadcrumbs: (items: BreadcrumbItem[]) => void;
  
  trackNavigation: (from: string, to: string, method: string) => void;
  updatePreferences: (preferences: Partial<NavigationPreferences>) => void;
}

// Keyboard shortcuts handler
export function useKeyboardNavigation() {
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (event: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (event.metaKey || event.ctrlKey) {
        switch (event.key) {
          case 'k':
            event.preventDefault();
            openCommandPalette();
            break;
          case 'n':
            event.preventDefault();
            handleContextualNew();
            break;
          case '1':
          case '2':
          case '3':
          case '4':
          case '5':
          case '6':
            event.preventDefault();
            navigateToSection(parseInt(event.key) - 1);
            break;
        }
      }
    };
    
    window.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => window.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, []);
}
```

### CODE EXAMPLES

#### Example 1: Responsive Navigation with Progressive Enhancement
```typescript
// ACTUAL CODE PATTERN TO FOLLOW:
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useRouter } from 'next/navigation';
import { useMediaQuery } from '@/hooks/useMediaQuery';

export function AdaptiveNavigation() {
  const router = useRouter();
  const isMobile = useMediaQuery('(max-width: 768px)');
  const isTablet = useMediaQuery('(max-width: 1024px)');
  const [sidebarCollapsed, setSidebarCollapsed] = useState(false);
  
  // Step 1: Determine navigation layout based on screen size
  const getNavigationLayout = () => {
    if (isMobile) return 'bottom-tabs';
    if (isTablet) return 'sidebar-collapsed';
    return sidebarCollapsed ? 'sidebar-collapsed' : 'sidebar-full';
  };
  
  // Step 2: Handle section navigation with analytics
  const handleSectionChange = async (sectionId: string, method: string = 'click') => {
    const currentSection = navigationStore.currentSection;
    
    // Track navigation analytics
    await supabase
      .from('navigation_analytics')
      .insert({
        section_from: currentSection,
        section_to: sectionId,
        navigation_method: method,
        session_id: getSessionId()
      });
    
    // Update store
    navigationStore.setCurrentSection(sectionId);
    navigationStore.addToRecent(sectionId);
    
    // Navigate
    const sectionConfig = navigationConfig.sections.find(s => s.id === sectionId);
    if (sectionConfig) {
      router.push(sectionConfig.href);
    }
  };
  
  // Step 3: Render appropriate navigation component
  const renderNavigation = () => {
    const layout = getNavigationLayout();
    
    switch (layout) {
      case 'bottom-tabs':
        return (
          <MobileNavigation
            currentSection={navigationStore.currentSection}
            sections={navigationConfig.sections}
            onSectionChange={handleSectionChange}
          />
        );
      
      case 'sidebar-collapsed':
        return (
          <>
            <TopNavigation
              compact={isTablet}
              onSectionChange={handleSectionChange}
            />
            <SideNavigation
              collapsed={true}
              section={navigationStore.currentSection}
              onToggleCollapse={() => setSidebarCollapsed(!sidebarCollapsed)}
            />
          </>
        );
      
      default:
        return (
          <>
            <TopNavigation onSectionChange={handleSectionChange} />
            <SideNavigation
              collapsed={false}
              section={navigationStore.currentSection}
              onToggleCollapse={() => setSidebarCollapsed(true)}
            />
          </>
        );
    }
  };
  
  // Step 4: Persist sidebar state
  useEffect(() => {
    const savedCollapsed = localStorage.getItem('sidebar-collapsed');
    if (savedCollapsed !== null) {
      setSidebarCollapsed(JSON.parse(savedCollapsed));
    }
  }, []);
  
  useEffect(() => {
    localStorage.setItem('sidebar-collapsed', JSON.stringify(sidebarCollapsed));
  }, [sidebarCollapsed]);
  
  return (
    <div className={`navigation-container layout-${getNavigationLayout()}`}>
      {renderNavigation()}
    </div>
  );
}
```

#### Example 2: Smart Command Palette with Fuzzy Search
```typescript
// ACTUAL CODE PATTERN TO FOLLOW:
import Fuse from 'fuse.js';
import { useState, useEffect, useMemo } from 'react';

export function CommandPalette({ open, onClose }: CommandPaletteProps) {
  const [query, setQuery] = useState('');
  const [selectedIndex, setSelectedIndex] = useState(0);
  const [recentSearches, setRecentSearches] = useState<string[]>([]);
  
  // Step 1: Build searchable items from all app content
  const searchableItems = useMemo(() => {
    const items: SearchableItem[] = [];
    
    // Add navigation pages
    navigationConfig.sections.forEach(section => {
      items.push({
        type: 'page',
        title: section.label,
        description: `Navigate to ${section.label}`,
        href: section.href,
        icon: section.icon,
        section: section.id,
        keywords: [section.label.toLowerCase()]
      });
      
      // Add subsections
      section.subsections.forEach(sub => {
        items.push({
          type: 'page',
          title: sub.label,
          description: sub.description || `Go to ${sub.label}`,
          href: sub.href,
          icon: section.icon,
          section: section.id,
          keywords: [section.label.toLowerCase(), sub.label.toLowerCase()]
        });
      });
    });
    
    // Add quick actions
    items.push(
      {
        type: 'action',
        title: 'Add New Client',
        description: 'Create a new client profile',
        href: '/clients/new',
        icon: 'UserPlus',
        section: 'clients',
        keywords: ['add', 'new', 'client', 'create']
      },
      {
        type: 'action',
        title: 'Create Form',
        description: 'Build a new form',
        href: '/forms/create',
        icon: 'Plus',
        section: 'forms',
        keywords: ['create', 'form', 'build', 'new']
      },
      {
        type: 'action',
        title: 'Import Clients',
        description: 'Upload CSV or Excel file',
        href: '/clients/import',
        icon: 'Upload',
        section: 'clients',
        keywords: ['import', 'upload', 'csv', 'excel', 'clients']
      }
    );
    
    return items;
  }, []);
  
  // Step 2: Configure fuzzy search
  const fuse = useMemo(() => {
    return new Fuse(searchableItems, {
      keys: [
        { name: 'title', weight: 2 },
        { name: 'description', weight: 1 },
        { name: 'keywords', weight: 1.5 },
        { name: 'section', weight: 0.5 }
      ],
      threshold: 0.4,
      includeScore: true,
      includeMatches: true
    });
  }, [searchableItems]);
  
  // Step 3: Perform search with recent queries fallback
  const searchResults = useMemo(() => {
    if (!query.trim()) {
      // Show recent searches when no query
      return recentSearches
        .map(search => searchableItems.find(item => 
          item.title.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase())
        ))
        .filter(Boolean)
        .slice(0, 5);
    }
    
    return fuse.search(query, { limit: 10 }).map(result => result.item);
  }, [query, fuse, recentSearches, searchableItems]);
  
  // Step 4: Handle keyboard navigation
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (event: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (!open) return;
      
      switch (event.key) {
        case 'ArrowDown':
          event.preventDefault();
          setSelectedIndex(prev => 
            prev < searchResults.length - 1 ? prev + 1 : 0
          );
          break;
        
        case 'ArrowUp':
          event.preventDefault();
          setSelectedIndex(prev => 
            prev > 0 ? prev - 1 : searchResults.length - 1
          );
          break;
        
        case 'Enter':
          event.preventDefault();
          if (searchResults[selectedIndex]) {
            handleSelect(searchResults[selectedIndex]);
          }
          break;
        
        case 'Escape':
          event.preventDefault();
          onClose();
          break;
      }
    };
    
    window.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => window.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, [open, selectedIndex, searchResults]);
  
  // Step 5: Handle selection and track usage
  const handleSelect = (item: SearchableItem) => {
    // Track search usage
    if (query.trim()) {
      setRecentSearches(prev => 
        [query, ...prev.filter(s => s !== query)].slice(0, 5)
      );
    }
    
    // Navigate and close
    router.push(item.href);
    onClose();
    
    // Track navigation
    navigationStore.trackNavigation(
      navigationStore.currentSection,
      item.section,
      'search'
    );
  };
  
  return (
    <div className={`command-palette ${open ? 'open' : 'closed'}`}>
      <input
        value={query}
        onChange={(e) => setQuery(e.target.value)}
        placeholder="Search pages, clients, actions..."
        className="command-input"
        autoFocus
      />
      
      <div className="search-results">
        {searchResults.map((item, index) => (
          <div
            key={`${item.type}-${item.title}`}
            className={`search-result ${index === selectedIndex ? 'selected' : ''}`}
            onClick={() => handleSelect(item)}
          >
            <Icon name={item.icon} />
            <div className="result-content">
              <div className="result-title">{item.title}</div>
              <div className="result-description">{item.description}</div>
            </div>
            <div className="result-section">{item.section}</div>
          </div>
        ))}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

### TEST REQUIREMENTS

#### Unit Tests Required
```typescript
describe('Navigation Structure', () => {
  it('should render correct sections based on user tier', () => {
    const starterUser = { tier: 'starter' };
    const proUser = { tier: 'professional' };
    
    const starterSections = getAvailableSections(starterUser);
    const proSections = getAvailableSections(proUser);
    
    expect(starterSections).not.toContain('journeys');
    expect(proSections).toContain('journeys');
  });
  
  it('should track navigation analytics', async () => {
    const trackSpy = jest.spyOn(navigationStore, 'trackNavigation');
    
    await handleSectionChange('clients', 'click');
    
    expect(trackSpy).toHaveBeenCalledWith('dashboard', 'clients', 'click');
  });
  
  it('should persist sidebar preferences', () => {
    const { result } = renderHook(() => useNavigationStore());
    
    act(() => {
      result.current.toggleSidebar();
    });
    
    expect(localStorage.getItem('sidebar-collapsed')).toBe('true');
  });
});

describe('Command Palette', () => {
  it('should find items with fuzzy search', () => {
    render(<CommandPalette open={true} onClose={jest.fn()} />);
    
    fireEvent.change(screen.getByPlaceholderText('Search...'), {
      target: { value: 'crt frm' }
    });
    
    expect(screen.getByText('Create Form')).toBeInTheDocument();
  });
  
  it('should navigate with keyboard shortcuts', () => {
    render(<CommandPalette open={true} onClose={jest.fn()} />);
    
    fireEvent.keyDown(window, { key: 'ArrowDown' });
    fireEvent.keyDown(window, { key: 'Enter' });
    
    expect(mockRouter.push).toHaveBeenCalled();
  });
});
```

#### E2E Tests Required
```typescript
// Using Playwright MCP
test('Navigation structure works across devices', async () => {
  // Test desktop navigation
  await mcp__playwright__browser_navigate({url: '/dashboard'});
  
  await mcp__playwright__browser_click({
    element: 'Clients section',
    ref: '[data-testid="nav-clients"]'
  });
  
  await mcp__playwright__browser_wait_for({url: '/clients'});
  
  // Test sidebar collapse
  await mcp__playwright__browser_click({
    element: 'Collapse sidebar',
    ref: '[data-testid="collapse-sidebar"]'
  });
  
  await mcp__playwright__browser_wait_for({text: 'Sidebar collapsed'});
  
  // Test mobile navigation
  await mcp__playwright__browser_resize({width: 375, height: 667});
  
  await mcp__playwright__browser_click({
    element: 'Forms tab',
    ref: '[data-testid="mobile-nav-forms"]'
  });
  
  await mcp__playwright__browser_wait_for({url: '/forms'});
});

test('Command palette search and navigation', async () => {
  await mcp__playwright__browser_navigate({url: '/dashboard'});
  
  // Open command palette
  await mcp__playwright__browser_press_key({key: 'Meta+k'});
  
  await mcp__playwright__browser_wait_for({text: 'Search pages, clients, actions'});
  
  // Search for create form
  await mcp__playwright__browser_type({
    element: 'Command palette input',
    ref: '[data-testid="command-input"]',
    text: 'create form'
  });
  
  // Use keyboard navigation
  await mcp__playwright__browser_press_key({key: 'ArrowDown'});
  await mcp__playwright__browser_press_key({key: 'Enter'});
  
  await mcp__playwright__browser_wait_for({url: '/forms/create'});
});

test('Navigation keyboard shortcuts work', async () => {
  await mcp__playwright__browser_navigate({url: '/dashboard'});
  
  // Test section shortcuts
  await mcp__playwright__browser_press_key({key: 'Meta+2'});
  await mcp__playwright__browser_wait_for({url: '/clients'});
  
  await mcp__playwright__browser_press_key({key: 'Meta+3'});
  await mcp__playwright__browser_wait_for({url: '/forms'});
  
  // Test new action shortcut
  await mcp__playwright__browser_press_key({key: 'Meta+n'});
  await mcp__playwright__browser_wait_for({text: 'New Client'});
});
```

### ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA
- [ ] Maximum 3 clicks to reach any feature
- [ ] Consistent navigation patterns across all sections
- [ ] Keyboard shortcuts work (Cmd+K, Cmd+1-6, Cmd+N)
- [ ] Mobile bottom navigation equally functional
- [ ] Sidebar collapse state persists across sessions
- [ ] Command palette finds content with fuzzy search
- [ ] Feature locks display correctly by tier
- [ ] Breadcrumbs show current location
- [ ] Navigation adapts responsively to screen size
- [ ] Active section clearly highlighted
- [ ] Loading states prevent navigation confusion
- [ ] Accessibility: Screen reader compatible

### DEPENDENCIES
- Must complete after: WS-007 (Main Dashboard Layout)
- Must complete before: All other features (foundational)
- Shares code with: WS-007 (layout integration)
